response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I understand it might seem pricey at first glance. However, considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $120? This price reflects both the product's value and my desire to make it accessible to you.", "product_price": 120}
